title: Pacific terminal
creator_credit: Commonwealth Department of Information and Government of NSW
brief_description: A survey of the capital city of New South Wales, Sydney on Port Jackson. Includes aerial footage of Sydney; monuments in Macquarie Place; inland footage of shearers and bullocks hauling logs; and Australians enjoying a range of recreational activities.
